SectionBody.Text: An athletic trainer shall practice within a written protocol established between the athletic trainer and a supervising physician licensed under chapter 458, chapter 459, chapter 460, or otherwise authorized by Florida law to practice medicine or, at an athletic event, pursuant to direction from a physician licensed under chapter 458, chapter 459, chapter 460, or otherwise authorized by Florida law to practice medicine. A written protocol shall require that the athletic trainer notify the supervising physician of new injuries as soon as practicable.
